entry.name: MAV_CMD_SKYE_RESET_AU
entry.description: Request the reset of an actuation unit component (see MAV_COMP_ID_SERVO)

entry.name: MAV_CMD_SET_SKYE_CONTROL_MODE
entry.description: Set Skye control mode parameter. TODO: Separate stabilisation from input interpretation
entry.param: 0: manual, 1: stab 5DOF, 2: stab 5DOF. See enum SKYE_CONTROL_MODE

enum.name: MAV_ACTUATION_UNIT_STATUS
enum.description: This is the ActuationNode status enum.

entry.name: MAV_ACTUATION_UNIT_STATUS_DETACHED
entry.description: Actuation unit is detached.

entry.name: MAV_ACTUATION_UNIT_STATUS_INITIALIZING
entry.description: Actuation unit is initializing.

entry.name: MAV_ACTUATION_UNIT_STATUS_HOMING
entry.description: Actuation unit is currently homing.

entry.name: MAV_ACTUATION_UNIT_STATUS_READY
entry.description: Actuation unit is ready to work.

entry.name: MAV_ACTUATION_UNIT_STATUS_DISABLED
entry.description: Actuation unit is disabled. (Either because of low battery or because of the disable switch)

entry.name: MAV_ACTUATION_UNIT_STATUS_ERROR
entry.description: An error occurred while initialising or operating.

entry.name: MAV_ACTUATION_UNIT_STATUS_UNKNOWN
entry.description: Actuation unit state has not been determined yet.

enum.name: LED_CONTROL_MODE
enum.description: LED control modes. Defines interpretation of LED_CONTROL message parameters.

entry.name: LED_CONTROL_MODE_CONSTANT
entry.description: Constant light intensity and color

entry.name: LED_CONTROL_MODE_BLINK
entry.description: Switch LED on/off with given frequency

entry.name: LED_CONTROL_MODE_PULS
entry.description: Dim LED like a pulser with given frequency

entry.name: LED_CONTROL_MODE_RAINBOW
entry.description: Rotate color wheel (hue) with given frequency

entry.name: LED_CONTROL_MODE_DISCO
entry.description: Random pulses/diming/color changes. Considering given frequency

entry.name: LED_CONTROL_MODE_POWER
entry.description: Color depending on given motor power

entry.name: LED_CONTROL_MODE_SPEED
entry.description: Color depending on translational speed

entry.name: LED_CONTROL_MODE_SPEED_ROT
entry.description: Color depending on rotational speed

entry.name: BATTERY_STATUS_BIT_ATTACHED
entry.description: Battery has been detected

entry.name: BATTERY_STATUS_BIT_UNDERVOLTAGE
entry.description: Battery has undervoltage

entry.name: BATTERY_STATUS_BIT_DISABLED
entry.description: Battery has been disabled

entry.name: BATTERY_STATUS_BIT_CHARGING
entry.description: Battery is being charged

entry.name: BATTERY_STATUS_BIT_BALANCING
entry.description: Battery is being balanced

entry.name: BATTERY_STATUS_BIT_FULL
entry.description: Battery is fully charged

entry.name: BATTERY_STATUS_BIT_ERROR
entry.description: Battery error occured

enum.name: SKYE_CONTROL_MODE
enum.description: Defines interpretation of MAV_CMD_SET_SKYE_CONTROL_MODE message parameters.

entry.name: SKYE_CONTROL_MODE_MANUAL
entry.description: Direct control of resulting moment and force. No att/rate controller.

entry.name: SKYE_CONTROL_MODE_5DOF
entry.description: Attitude control. Rate input roll is blocked.

entry.name: SKYE_CONTROL_MODE_6DOF
entry.description: Attitude control. Rate inputs for all axis enabled.

entry.name: SKYE_CONTROL_MODE_6DOFI
entry.description: Attitude control. Rate inputs for all axis enabled in I-frame.

entry.name: SKYE_POS_C_MOD_MANUAL
entry.description: Direct control of resulting force. No position/velocity controller.

entry.name: SKYE_POS_C_MOD_CASCADE_PID
entry.description: Cascade controller.

entry.name: SKYE_POS_C_MOD_PID
entry.description: PID controller

entry.name: SKYE_ATT_C_MOD_MANUAL
entry.description: Direct control of resulting moment. No att/rate controller.

entry.name: SKYE_ATT_C_MOD_5_DOF
entry.description: Attitude control. Rate input roll is blocked.

entry.name: SKYE_ATT_C_MOD_6_DOF
entry.description: Attitude control. Rate inputs for all axis enabled.

entry.name: SKYE_ATT_C_MOD_6_DOFI
entry.description: Attitude control. Rate inputs for all axis enabled in I-frame.

message.name: ACTUATOR_LIMITS
message.description: Actuator limits for up to 6 actuation units

message.name: ACTUATION_CONFIGURATION
message.description: Settings for up to 6 actuation units: Rotation parameters of AU. This fully describes position on on a spherical hull.
message.field: Quaternion q_BM that describes rotation of AU 1 towards UAV
Quaternion q_BM that describes rotation of AU 2 towards UAV
Quaternion q_BM that describes rotation of AU 3 towards UAV
Quaternion q_BM that describes rotation of AU 4 towards UAV
Quaternion q_BM that describes rotation of AU 5 towards UAV
Quaternion q_BM that describes rotation of AU 6 towards UAV

message.name: ACTUATION_STATUS
message.field: -1: unknown, 0: detached:, 1: init, 2: homing, 3: ready, 4: disabled, 5: error

message.name: ALLOCATION_OUTPUT
message.description: Raw allocation sensor values for up to 6 AUs

message.name: ACTUATION_FEEDBACK
message.description: Actuation feedback for up to 6 actuation units

message.name: SKYE_FEEDBACK_COMBINED
message.description: Combined message containing data for actuation configuration estimation.
message.field: Raw angular velocity. IMU frame. rad/sec
Filtered angular acceleration. IMU frame. rad/sec
Filtered angular velocity. IMU frame. rad/sec
Thrust estimate of actuation units in Newton
Orientation readout of actuation units in Degree

message.name: RANGE_SENSOR_RAW
message.description: Raw distance measurements from sender to receiver modules (nanotron)

message.name: LED_CONTROL
message.description: Control single LED or LED array
message.field: Compare LED_CONTROL_MODE enumerator - 0: Constant light, 1: Blink on/off, 2: Pulsate, 3: Colorloop, 4: Disco, 5: power, 6: speed, 7: rotation

message.name: SETPOINT_6DOF
message.description: Set the 6 DOF setpoint for an attrate and velocity controller.

message.name: SETPOINT_12DOF
message.description: Set the 12 DOF setpoint for up to 12 actuators

message.description: Combined message containing attitude data from skye_ros package.
message.field: Roll body angular rate (rad/s, x forward/y right/z down)
Pitch body angular rate (rad/s, x forward/y right/z down)
Yaw body angular rate (rad/s, x forward/y right/z down)

message.description: Combined message containing position data from mavros.
